params.contentId: The ID of the content to be approved.

params.account: The address of the account to verify.

returns._0: True if the content is active, false otherwise.
True if the content is approved, false otherwise.

params.contentId: The ID of the content to be rejected.

params.account: The address of the account to revoke.

params.contentId: The ID of the content to be submitted.
params.initiator: The address of the initiator submitting the content.

approve(uint256).notice: Approves a proposition in the referendum.

grantVerified(address).notice: Grants the verified role to a specific account.

isActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the content is active nor blocked.

isApproved(address,uint256).notice: Checks if the content is approved.

reject(uint256).notice: Rejects a proposition in the referendum.

revokeVerified(address).notice: Revoke the verified role to a specific account.

submit(uint256,address).notice: Submits a new proposition for referendum.
